name: Tech Innovators Workshop
description: Hands-on session exploring AI and IoT projects.

name: Campus Sustainability Fair
description: Discover eco-friendly initiatives and clubs on campus.

name: Cultural Fusion Night
description: Celebrate diversity through music, food, and art from around the world.

name: Photography Walk: Capturing Campus Life
description: Join fellow creatives for a guided photo walk around campus landmarks.

name: Intro to Python Workshop
description: Learn to code your first project with hands-on guidance from peers.

name: Women in Tech Networking Mixer
description: Connect with peers and professionals in STEM fields over refreshments.

name: AI for Good Hackathon
description: 24-hour challenge to design tech solutions for community impact.

name: Sunrise Yoga on the Quad
description: Start your day with mindfulness and movement in the fresh morning air.

name: Campus Fun Run 5K
description: Join students and staff for a scenic charity run across campus.

name: Community Garden Clean-Up
description: Help maintain the campus garden and promote sustainability.

name: Letters of Hope
description: Write encouraging letters to hospitalized children to brighten their day.

name: Resume Review & Coffee Chat
description: Meet recruiters and get feedback on your resume while enjoying free coffee.

name: Startup Pitch Night
description: Watch student entrepreneurs pitch their startups to local investors.

name: Exam Prep Study Marathon
description: Collaborative study session with free snacks, coffee, and peer tutoring.

name: Research 101: Getting Started in Labs
description: Learn how to find and apply for undergraduate research opportunities.

name: Interfaith Dialogue Dinner
description: Explore shared values across different faiths over dinner and discussion.

name: Boba & Board Games Night
description: Relax, play games, and meet new friends at this casual hangout event.
